name: Explosive Revenge
description:
Story

You are a weapon with a soul. You wake up inside Factory 2B. The year is 1995 in a parallel universe.
You seek revenge because you have been a slave to the human world for more than 30 years. So you set out to destroy the very factory you've been born in...

Instructions

Move around with WASD

Look around using your mouse

Jump with Spacebar

Disclaimer

- The game is not complete
- Gameplay is almost non-existent
- Robots work (kinda)
- The game cannot be completed
- You can't go up again once you're underwater
